reviewText: bought this product to finish my collection without realizing that its for the psp which i don't have. still came in good condition and on time

Tenjho Tenge, Volume 1 - Episodes 1 & 2 [UMD for PSP] A whole lot of action is what defines this series and the first two episodes kick it off nicely. A juvenile delinquent transfers to a new school where the rules are different. It turns out he's not as tough as he thought he was and there are plenty of people willing to put him in his place. A romance in its infancy and powerful martial artists displaying moves that just touch on the intensity of the action to come. Anime fans will enjoy!
